document_data.caption: An anti-vermin barriers keeping the trash out.
document_data.name: Anti-Vermin Barrier
document_data.mainbody: '''''Anti-vermin barrier''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[abjuration]] [[spell]] from the [[wards sphere]] that created a barrier that repelled all nonmagical vermin.
document_data.Effects: This spell created an invisible barrier that repelled nonmagical vermin including [[spider]]s, insects, [[rat]]s, [[snake]]s, worms, etc. The ''anti-vermin barrier'' did nothing to stop larger versions of these creatures. The barrier was a cube measuring {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} on each side.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s the caster's [[holy symbol]] and a rodent whisker to cast.
document_data.History: The ''[[Helm of Helm]]'', a holy text from the [[Church of Helm]], contained the ''anti-vermin barrier'' spell. It was also recorded in ''[[Yornar's Trail Companion]]'', a holy text of the [[church of Mielikki]].<ref>
